metadata.title: CVE-2019-16163 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Oniguruma before 6.9.3 allows Stack Exhaustion in regcomp.c because ofrecursion in regparse.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16163` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libonig2 - 5.9.6-1ubuntu0.1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libonig package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.9.6-1ubuntu0.1+esm2').
